amendment.description: Amendment allows families on welfare to receive additional benefits for a child born to a welfare recipient, provided such benefits are provided in the form of vouchers that may be used only for goods and services needed to care for the child.
amendment.purpose: An amendment which would allow families on welfare to receive additional benefits for new children born while the family is on welfare--provided such benefits are provided in the form of vouchers that may be used only for goods and services needed to care for the child.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 352 - 80 (Roll no. 261).
